input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Selector (22.60 hourly - 6:30 PM Shift) in Santa Fe Springs, CA

Location: Santa Fe Springs, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
POSITION PURPOSE:

Responsible for having a strong understanding of the equipment he/she uses, pick locations, pallet building, productivity measures and safety procedures.

6 PM SHIFT

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS AND BASIC DUTIES:

Inspects assigned jack for safety issues. Stages pallets in the appropriate bay.Enters the proper information into the productivity measure.Identifies the correct pick location and pick sequence in order.Picks the correct item and quantity, checking UPCâ€™s or item descriptions. Places pick labels.Correctly identifies Master Case locations. Identifies and reports miss-located products.Shrink wraps and labels with correct truck, stop and other required information.Listens for first and last call and obtains all out of stocks in a timely manner.Keeps area clean and debris out of work area. Obtains aisle-cleaning assignment.Immediately informs a foreman, supervisor or manager of any potential safety threats.Operates pallet jack/push cart in a safe and efficient manner. Builds a stable and cubed pallet.Reports to supervisor or lead any violation of company policy.Parks and recharges pallet jack in its appropriate spot at the end of your shift.Perform duties in accordance with Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points (HACCP) and Safe Quality Food (SQF) policies and procedures.Other duties as assigned

PERFORMANCE MEASUREMENTS:

Selector functions are completed in accordance with Company standards and procedures including quality standards and safety regulations.Effective communication and coordination exist with Company personnel and with management. Assistance and support are provided as needed.Deadlines are met.

QUALIFICATIONS:

 High School Diploma/GED Preferred. Understanding of Safety guidelines and basic RF system functions ideal.

SKILLS/ABILITIES:

Ability to select at established minimum rate for departmentAstute, close attention to detail. Ability to lift 50+ pounds continuously. Understand and properly follow all selecting procedures and verbal instructions in your respective area: grocery, repack, cooler/freezer.Possess an understanding of procedures in other areas of the warehouse for a more global understanding of all processes.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. UNFI is an Equal Opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive and respectful environment for all. - M/F/Veteran/Disability. VEVRAA Federal Contractor.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Warehouse Selector
output_json.summary: Full-time position responsible for equipment safety, pallet management, productivity, and adherence to safety procedures.
job_responsibilities: Identifies correct pick location and sequence
Listens for calls and obtains out of stocks
Performs duties according to HACCP and SQF policies
output_json.company_information: UNFI is an Equal Opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive and respectful environment for all.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.
